{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4218531,"totalDownVotes":771169,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":235187,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":609747,"totalDownVotes":46861,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":69185,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1118649,"totalDownVotes":119019,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":185581,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":525696,"totalDownVotes":36878,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":37851,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3764127,"totalDownVotes":310148,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":50633,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2768005,"totalDownVotes":362796,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":27898,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"골든 나이프로 처치하면 승리, 처치/도움 수를 늘려 골든 나이프를 얻는 길로 달려가요.

아스널에서 이제 15세 등급과 게임패드, 모바일을 지원해요. 또 새롭고 별난 무기들로 선두에 서 봐요!

상점은 매일 갱신됩니다. 새 아이템은 항상 로테이션 돼요!

변역인: TimeBinder"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1018683,"totalDownVotes":51219,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":26587,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":263882,"totalDownVotes":33554,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":17432,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4354621,"totalDownVotes":589116,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak 👀","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":18821,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👀

- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2130762,"totalDownVotes":656759,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":38411,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Sei der Erste, der die Spitze erreicht, in diesem zufällig generierten Hindernissparkur ohne jegliche Checkpoints

https://www.roblox.com/games/2127551566/THE-Tower-of-Hell"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1416860,"totalDownVotes":118836,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":23592,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Zbuduj swój statek i wypłyń na podróż!

Nie zapomnij zobaczyć naszej grupy! https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840 

Zyski Grupowe: ✨Członek✨ --- 25% więcej złota! 
💫Mega Członek💫 --- 300% więcej życia! --- 25% więcej złota!
🌟Członek Królewski🌟 --- +4 Beczki TNT! --- 300% więcej życia! --- 25% więcej złota!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2071113,"totalDownVotes":286697,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":22316,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1187605,"totalDownVotes":67809,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":16903,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2193336,"totalDownVotes":300251,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":37492,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3224827,"totalDownVotes":282267,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":22671,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":695415,"totalDownVotes":94420,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":14547,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":660691,"totalDownVotes":128127,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":9425,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":140722,"totalDownVotes":7782,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":8673,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":6465898,"creatorName":"Last EXE","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":10171,"totalDownVotes":2088,"universeId":2340432463,"name":"[New Event!!] Last Pirates","placeId":6329844902,"playerCount":11029,"imageToken":"T_6329844902_7145","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Current Level cap : 600
Current Fruit : Tori,Yami,Pika,Mera,Moku,Suna,Suke,Guru,Yomi,Bomu,Hie,Magu,Zushi,Gura,Soru,Bisu,Bari

Devil fruit spawn every 30 mins and respawn every 10 mins

Control
Q - Dash
Ctrl - Sprint/Run
Double spacebar - Geppo
F- Flash Step
J - Armament"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1794262,"totalDownVotes":139994,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":6413,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":7371243,"creatorName":"Ready, set, more!","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":239609,"totalDownVotes":13079,"universeId":1934249057,"name":"Tropical Resort Tycoon 🌴","placeId":5534174456,"playerCount":12123,"imageToken":"T_5534174456_abb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"METAVERSE CHAMPIONS EVENT:

🌴 Enter the portal across the street from the Resort!
🌋 Build a secret Volcano Island (limited time event)
👧 Build the first lab to receive Fey's Week 3 badge!
🎁 Receive a permanent in-game prize for completing the island!

Event ends May 7th! 

Build your Tropical Resort and complete your island! Drive epic vehicles, roleplay with friends, explore, and so much more! 🌴🌊🚘

💾 Tycoons autosave 💾 

🔔 Hit the FOLLOW button to get notified about updates! 🔔

Brought to you by the team at Ready, set, play!

filiptibell - Scripting & UI
pollopollop - Game Design & Modeling
michaelvanderfin - World Design & Modeling

🎮 Join our group for 10,000 in-game currency! 🎮
https://www.roblox.com/groups/7371243"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2321127,"totalDownVotes":243898,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":21830,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:

Credits:

Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":513902,"totalDownVotes":42260,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":9067,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[이 게임은 베타 버전이므로 버그가 있습니다!]
이 세상에서는 아무도 혼자 살아남을 수 없습니다. 친구들과 팀을 이루어 수많은 좀비를 물리치고, 보스와 싸우고 동전을 얻고 레벨을 올리며 새로운 타워까지 구입하세요! 당신이 모험심을 느끼고 있다면, 더 어려운 난이도의 더 어려운 보스들과 싸워보세요!

👥💵 그룹에 가입하셔서 $100 시작 현금을 받으세요! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍 좋은 업데이트를 위해서 좋아요를 눌러주세요!🌟

업데이트:
+ 일렉트로 쇼커 ⚡
+폴른 킹의 분노 상태 😡
+타워의 스탯 표시 📊
+버그 패치

전체 업데이트 로그: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":186229,"totalDownVotes":30598,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":5461,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":910714,"totalDownVotes":118600,"universeId":892043755,"name":"Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":6648,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 74 🚨

Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
